name: GameBookVR
description:
This is a VR experience for OCULUS / META QUEST 2 with an old school gameplay and dynamics translated in a vr 360 3d scenario. A short demo adventure to live again the magic feel of the 80's game books. Italian and English Version.

This is my first App published! Sorry for the English translation but this is a zero-budget indie project. I would like to continue to develop this kind of experience (maybe with a sci-fi adventure!), helpful to get closer to VR everyone, not only the expert gamers.

If you like, please review and send me a feedback! Feel free to contact me at: marclamanna21@gmail.com Enjoy!

You can download an .apk file. Must be uploaded on Quest 2 via software like Sidequest
